name: Combos, Combos, and More Combos
description:
This game combines the skills of a platformer with the thinking of a card combat game.

In the platformer sections, you can try and find booster packs to add more cards to your deck. The harder it is to get a booster pack, the better the cards in it.

Said deck will be used in the combat card game sections.

To maximize your effect during combat, you can combine cards such as "Damage" or "Health" with "Add" and "Multiply" cards to increase their values. The order in which you combine cards matters.

Controls for platformer:

Arrow keys or WASD to move and jump

Shift to move faster

F to interact with your opponent (the blue guy)
